Industrial Automation with VFD & Siemens PLC (2025)

Technologies: Siemens S7-1200 PLC, VFD, PNP Encoder, TIA Portal, HMI

Successfully designed and implemented an industrial automation system using a Variable Frequency Drive (VFD), PNP-type rotary encoder, and Siemens S7-1200 PLC for real-time motor speed and position control.

The Mitsubishi RV-2FRB-D-S25 Robot Project

The Mitsubishi RV-2FRB-D-S25 is a compact, high-precision industrial robot designed for tasks like assembly, pick-and-place, and packaging. With a 2 kg payload capacity, it offers fast, accurate movements and energy efficiency. It‚Äôs ideal for industries like automotive and electronics, featuring safety features for collaborative work.

A Pneumatic Circuit Project using Festo Components

Just wrapped up a pneumatic circuit project using Festo components.

The system runs a repeating A+ B+ B- A- sequence, controlled by a selector switch and backed by an emergency stop for added safety.

It's always satisfying to see simple pneumatic logic deliver reliable and repeatable motion without needing complex programming. Festo valves and cylinders made the setup smooth and responsive.

These kinds of solutions remind me why pneumatics are still a great choice for many industrial tasks‚Äîclean, fast, and easy to maintain.

Happy to connect with others working on similar systems!
